string-array.name: club_desc
string-array.item: Futbol Club Barcelona, known simply as Barcelona and colloquially as Barça, is a professional football club based in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
Real Madrid Club is a professional football club based in Madrid, Spain.
FC Bayern München is a German sports club based in Munich, Bavaria.
Manchester City Football Club, commonly known as City, is a football club in Manchester, England. Founded in 1880 as St. Marks (West Gorton).
Manchester United Football Club, commonly known as Man. United or simply United, is a professional football club based in Old Trafford.
Chelsea Football Club is a professional football club in London, England, that competes in the Premier League. Founded in 1905, the clubs home ground since then has been Stamford Bridge.
Associazione Calcio Milan, commonly referred to as A.C. Milan or simply Milan, is a professional football club in Milan, Italy, founded in 1899.
Arsenal Football Club is a professional football club based in Islington, London, England, that plays in the Premier League, the top flight of English football.
